3.eng-name: The Book of Menstruation and Istihadah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"Umm Habibah bint Jahsh asked the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ): 'O Messenger of Allah, I suffer from Istihadah.' He said: 'That is a vein, so perform Ghusl, then pray.' And she used to perform Ghusl for each prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِسْتِحَاضَةِ وَإِقْبَالِ الدَّمِ وَإِدْبَارِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mention Of Al-Istihadah And The Coming And Going Of The Regular Period
